shelfItem.cmds: from solstice_config import solstice_updater; reload(solstice_updater); solstice_updater.updateTools(True);
from solstice_config import solstice_main; reload(solstice_main); solstice_main.updateSolsticeProject();
from solstice_utilities import solstice_texturesRelinker; reload(solstice_texturesRelinker); solstice_texturesRelinker.initUI();
from solstice_utilities import solstice_sanityCheck; reload(solstice_sanityCheck); solstice_sanityCheck.sanityCheck(True);
